tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ecotourism_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    coordinates VARCHAR(255),
    accessibility BOOLEAN,
    biodiversity_data JSON
);

CREATE TABLE visitor_logs (
    log_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INTEGER,
    visitor_name VARCHAR(50),
    visit_date DATE,
    visit_duration INTERVAL
);

CREATE TABLE ecotourism_locations (
 location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 location_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 coordinates VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 accessibility BOOLEAN,
 biodiversity_data JSON
 );

CREATE TABLE location_reviews (
 review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 location_id INT NOT NULL,
 user_id INT NOT NULL,
 review_text TEXT,
 rating INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES ecotourism_locations(location_id)
 );

CREATE TABLE ecotourism_locations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(50),
  coordinates VARCHAR(100),
  accessibility BOOLEAN,
  biodiversity_data JSON
);

CREATE TABLE visitors (
  visitor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  visitor_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  email VARCHAR(100),
  date_visited DATE
);

CREATE TABLE accommodations (
  accommodation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT,
  type VARCHAR(50),
  capacity INT,
  cost DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE trails (
  trail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT,
  trail_name VARCHAR(50),
  difficulty VARCHAR(20),
  length FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE locations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    accessible BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE attractions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE biodiversity (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    species_name VARCHAR(255),
    population INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE activities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    activity_type VARCHAR(255),
    duration INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE accommodations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    accommodation_type VARCHAR(255),
    price DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES locations(id)
);
